headline: Why ON Semiconductor (ON) Is Up 9.1% After $6 Billion Buyback And New GaN Alliance
summary: In recent days, ON Semiconductor reported stronger-than-expected third-quarter 2025 results, announced a US$6.00 billion share buyback program starting in 2026, and disclosed a new collaboration with Innoscience to scale gallium nitride (GaN) power device manufacturing across key end markets. By pairing a large future capital return commitment with a GaN partnership aimed at robotics, automotive, telecommunications, and AI data centers, the company is sharpening its focus on higher-value...

headline: Tesla, Netflix, and ON Semiconductor: 3 Unusually Active Cash-Secured Put Options to Sell Now
summary: Thursday’s unusual options activity included puts on popular stocks such as Tesla and Netflix. If you are entertaining the idea of selling cash-secured puts to generate income while attempting to buy their stocks at lower prices, these three are worth considering.

headline: Is ON Semiconductor Stock Outperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: As ON Semiconductor has outperformed the Nasdaq recently, analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: S&P Futures Gain With All Eyes on Key U.S. PCE Inflation Data
summary: December S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESZ25) are trending up +0.16% this morning, extending their advance toward a new all-time high, while investors look ahead to the release of the Federal Reserve’s first-line inflation gauge.
